extended_event_descriptor.text: More everyday items go under the microscope as we find out how carpets, drinking water and acoustic guitars are made.

short_event_descriptor.name: Ed Stafford: First Man Out: Borneo

extended_event_descriptor.text: Ed Stafford challenges ultra-fit ex-Marine and ropes expert Aldo Kane to a race across the tangled wilds of Borneo's crocodile-infested mangrove swamps

Adam Savage makes his own Iron Man armour suit made from titanium. He wants it to be bulletproof, suitable for flying and it needs to be able to survive an explosion
